segments.text: Could I ask some questions regarding to the social benefits ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long is my paid vacation every year ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You'll have 10 days paid vacation every year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about the insurance and housing policies ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We will provide you with life insurance , health insurance , accident insurance , housing benefits , heating allowance and transportation allowance .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You ’ ll be paid a bonus at the end of every year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We provide our employees with training opportunities at home and abroad .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I don ’ t have any other questions so far . I would like to think for a couple of days before I give you my final answer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . I will ask Lucy to call you in two days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , thank you for your time and patience .
segments.speaker: S1
